            • Air passenger transport - ENP-South countries
            • Freight and mail air transport (including national transport) - ENP-South countries

      Education and training
        Participation in education and training
          Pupils and students - enrolments
            Early childhood education and primary education
            • Pupils enrolled in early childhood education by sex, type of institution and intensity of participation
            • Pupils enrolled in early childhood education by sex and age
            • Pupils enrolled in early childhood education by sex and NUTS 2 region
            • Pupils enrolled in primary education by sex, type of institution and intensity of participation
            • Pupils enrolled in primary education by sex and age
            • Pupils enrolled in primary education by sex and NUTS 2 region
            • Pupils in early childhood and primary education by education level and age - as % of corresponding age population
            Lower secondary, upper secondary and post-secondary non-tertiary education
            • Pupils enrolled in lower-secondary education by programme orientation, sex, type of institution and intensity of participation
            • Pupils enrolled in lower-secondary education by programme orientation, sex and age
            • Pupils enrolled in lower-secondary education by programme orientation, sex and NUTS 2 region
            • Pupils enrolled in upper secondary education by programme orientation, sex, type of institution and intensity of participation
            • Pupils enrolled in upper-secondary education by programme orientation, sex and age
            • Pupils enrolled in upper secondary education by programme orientation, sex and NUTS 2 region
            • Pupils enrolled in post-secondary non-tertiary education by programme orientation, sex, type of institution and intensity of participation
            • Pupils enrolled in post-secondary non-tertiary education by programme orientation, sex and age
            • Pupils enrolled in post-secondary non-tertiary education by programme orientation, sex and NUTS 2 region
            • Pupils enrolled in vocational upper secondary and post-secondary non-tertiary education by education level, sex and field of education
            Tertiary education
            • Students enrolled in tertiary education by education level, programme orientation, sex, type of institution and intensity of participation
            • Students enrolled in tertiary education by education level, programme orientation, sex and age
            • Students enrolled in tertiary education by education level, programme orientation, sex and field of education
            • Distribution of students enrolled at tertiary education levels by sex and field of education
            • Ratio of the proportion of tertiary students over the proportion of the population by NUTS 1 and NUTS 2 region
            • Students enrolled in tertiary education by education level, programme orientation, sex and NUTS 2 region
            • Students in tertiary education by age groups - as % of corresponding age population
            • Students in tertiary education - as % of 20-24 years old in the population
            All education levels
            • Pupils and students enrolled by education level, sex, type of institution and intensity of participation
            • Pupils and students enrolled by education level, sex and age
            • Pupils and students enrolled by education level, sex and field of education
            • Pupils and students by education level - as % of total age population
            • Pupils and students in education by age groups - as % of corresponding age population
            • Pupils and students in education aged 30 and over - per 1000 of corresponding age population
            • Expected school years of pupils and students by education level
            • Students in post-compulsory education - as % of the total population of post-compulsory school age
            • Students participation at the end of compulsory education - as % of the corresponding age population
            • Pupils from age 4 to the starting age of compulsory education at primary level, by sex - as % of the population of the corresponding age group
            • Pupils and students enrolled by education level, sex and NUTS 2 region
            • Pupils and students enrolled by sex, age and NUTS 2 region
            • Distribution of pupils and students enrolled in general and vocational programmes by education level and NUTS 2 region
            • Participation rates of selected age groups in education at regional level
            • Participation rates in selected education levels at regional level
            • Pupils and students enrolled by education level, programme orientation, completion and sex
            • Pupils from age 4 to the starting age of compulsory education at primary level by NUTS 2 region - % of the population of the corresponding age
            • Pupils from age 5 to the starting age of compulsory education at primary level by sex - % of the population of the corresponding age
            • Pupils aged 4 years old, by sex - as % of the population of the corresponding age group
            • Pupils aged 3 years old, by sex - as % of the population of the corresponding age group
            • Pupils from age 3 to the starting age of compulsory education at primary level by sex - % of the population of the corresponding age
            • Pupils from age 3 to the starting age of compulsory education at primary level by NUTS 2 region - % of the population of the corresponding age
            • Pupils from age 0 to the starting age of compulsory education at primary level by sex - % of the population of the corresponding age
            • Students enrolled in formal non-tertiary adult education by education level, sex and age group
            • Pupils under the age of 3 by sex - as % of the population of the corresponding age
            • Out-of-school rate by sex and age - as % of the population of the corresponding age
            • Out-of-school rate in population of lower secondary school age, by sex
            • Out-of-school rate in population of upper secondary school age, by sex
            • Distribution of students at education level and programme orientation by sex and field of education
            • Students enrolled in STEM education fields - per thousand of population aged 20-29

      Labour market
        Employment and unemployment (Labour force survey)

            Employment and activity - LFS adjusted series
            • Employment and activity by sex and age - annual data
            • Employment and activity by sex and age - quarterly data
            • Employment by educational attainment level - annual data
            • Employment by educational attainment level - quarterly data

            • Part-time employment and temporary contracts - quarterly data

            • Total absences from work by sex and age group - quarterly data

            • Employment and activity by sex and age (1989-2020) - quarterly data

            • Realised sample size - monthly data, experimental statistics

            • Key variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by type of farming (2-digit) and economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Key variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by type of farming (2-digit) and NUTS 2 region
            Overview - farm livestock
            • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals by type of farming (2-digit)
            • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals of different types by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 region
            • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals by livestock units (LSU) of farm and NUTS 2 region
            Overview - farm labour force
            • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by type of farming (2-digit) and economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of workers and NUTS 2 region
            Farm land use - Permanent crops, other farmland, irrigation
            • Irrigation: number of farms, areas and equipment by size of irrigated area and NUTS 2 region
            • Mushrooms, energy crops, GMO: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA)
            Farm labour force - historical data
            • Labour force categories: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of worker, legal satus of holding and agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Labour force categories: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by legal status of holding and economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Labour force categories: number of persons and farm work (AWU) in the holding by working time (% AWU) and agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            Other gainful activities and support for rural development (historical data)
            • Other gainful activities (OGA) of the farm of sole holder: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Other gainful activities (OGA) of the farm of sole holder: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Other gainful activities (OGA) of the farm of sole holder: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by type of farming (1-digit)
            • Other gainful activities (OGA) of the farm of sole holder: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by age of holder
            • Other gainful activities directly related to the holding: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by age and sex of holder
            Farm management and practises (historical data)
            • Holder-manager relationship: area, livestock, labour force and standard output (SO) by agricultural size of farm (UAA) (2005-2013)
            • Farm equipment: agricultural area and number of farms with different type of equipment by agricultural size of farm (UAA) (2010-2013)
            • Farm machinery: number of farms and machines by size of farm (UAA) (2013)
            • Organic farming: number of farms, areas with different crops and heads of different types of animals by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 region (2003-2013)
            • Agricultural training of farm managers: number of farms, agricultural area, labour force and standard output (SO) by age and sex of the manager (2005-2013)
            • Agricultural training of farm managers: number of farms, agricultural area, labour force, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) (2005-2013)

    Sustainable development indicators
      Goal 1 - No poverty
      • Persons at risk of poverty or social exclusion

      Goal 2 - Zero hunger

      • Road traffic deaths, by type of roads
      • Premature deaths due to exposure to fine particulate matter (PM2.5)

      • Early leavers from education and training by sex
      • Persons aged 25-34 with tertiary educational attainment level

      Goal 14 - Life below water

      • Share of environmental taxes in total tax revenues

        • EU imports from developing countries by country income groups

        • Usual reaction to future skill needs by type of reaction and NACE Rev. 2 activity - % of all enterprises
